ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:29:34 [Issue ID 4000-131155] urn:comicvine:4000-131155 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 10:06:33. [Issue ID 116702]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ian Richardson,Jonboy Meyers,Cory Walker,Michael Avon Oeming
ComicInfo.Summary: In an attempt to get on with her life following the death of her husband, Liz Donnelly-Noble gives her first solo interview on live television - something the Noble family isn't sure she's ready for. Meanwhile, Gaia tries to keep Zephyr's pregnancy a secret, and Rusty makes a bold decision about his future. Newcomer Jonboy Meyers pencils the back-up story, which traces the beginnings of Celeste's affair with Frost.
ComicInfo.Title: Family Secrets, Part One; Fire & Ice
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chris Sotomayor,Cory Walker,Damon Hacker,Michael Avon Oeming
